transcript.title: FOR PRESS: VISIT OF HER ROYAL HIGHNESS THE PRINCESS ALEXANDRA OF KENT
transcript.content:
FOR PRESS: VISIT OF HER ROYAL HIGHNESS THE PRINCESS ALEXANDRA
OF KENT
Commonwealth and State Directors of the tour of
Australia later this year of Her Royal Highness the Princess
O Alexandra of Kent met in Canberra to-day.
They discussed factors to be considered in the
formulation of a consolidated programme for the tour. A broad
outline programme will now be prepared and submitted to Her
Royal Highness in London before she leaves to visit Latin
America next month. Tentative dates for her itinerary are
Arrive Canberra, August 15, 1959; arrive Queensland, August 18;
arrive New South iales, September 9; arrive Victoria, September
16; arrive Canberra, September 23, prior to her departure from
Australia. CANBERRA, A. C. T.
8th January, 1959.
